Requests.AddOrder: INSERT INTO NewOrders (OrderId, OrderDate, CustomerId, PhoneNumber, Country, Region, District, City, Village, Street, HouseNumber, ApartmentNumber, OrderText, DeliveryType) VALUES (@OrderId, @OrderDate, @CustomerName, @PhoneNumber, @Country, @Region, @District, @City, @Village, @Street, @HouseNumber, @ApartmentNumber, @OrderText, @DeliveryType)
Requests.AddQuestion: INSERT INTO NewQuestions (QuestionId, QuestionDate, UserName, PhoneNumber, QuestionText) VALUES (@QuestionId, @QuestionDate, @UserName, @PhoneNumber, @QuestionText)
